attributes.action: Say NO to a second EU referendum!
attributes.additional_details: people who disagree with the outcome will be those asking for the second vote until they get what they want. It is clear that more people have voted out so it would only be fair to remain with the outcome.
attributes.background: I believe there should not be a second EU referendum due to the simple fact that britain had the chance to vote in or out but we chose out. It would not be fair to have a second vote.
